patterns::​composition_node
patterns::​ .​composition_leaf​#(IMP_T)
patterns::​ .​composite
patterns::​ .​composition_node​#(type IMP_T=uvm_sequence_base)

An adapter of a concrete composite node for sequences and sequence items.

For more information about composite classes, please refer to the composite interface class documentation.
